byline.original: By ROBERT MACKEY and RICK GLADSTONE

snippet: At least one guard was injured by the gunman, who was later shot and wounded by the police, who sealed off the embassy grounds.
lead_paragraph: At least one guard was injured by the gunman, who was later shot and wounded by the police, who sealed off the embassy grounds.

headline.main: Gunman Fires at U.S. Embassy in Sarajevo
headline.seo: Gunman Fires at U.S. Embassy in Sarajevo
